channel.title: I'm thinking about getting a new phone
channel.description:
[img]http://img409.imageshack.us/img409/4658/w810iblackhx6.jpg[/img][img]http://img411.imageshack.us/img411/104/w810iwhiteus2.jpg[/img]
I want to get one of these and a friend has the Black phone, but then I saw the white phone when i was showing my parents pictures from google and now like the white one better. Before I buy it, I want to see how many people like each color because I can't decide.

item.title: I'm thinking about getting a new phone
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

get they touch iphone its awesome but its going to piss you off if you forget to lock it and put it into your pocket

item.title: I'm thinking about getting a new phone
item.dc:creator: @0uch_a_arr0w 0uch a arr0w
item.description:
@0uch_a_arr0w wrote:

[center][size=15pt]Get The iPhone[/size][/center]

[center][size=15pt]Photo[/size]

[hr]
[size=15pt]Hot[/size]

[hr]
[size=15pt]Music[/size]

[hr]
[size=15pt]Video[/size]

[hr]
[size=15pt]Poon the Pen0r. 1337. Go BUY![/size]
[hr]
[size=15pt]Net[/size]

[hr]
[size=15pt]Mail[/size]

[hr]
[size=15pt]Map[/size]

[hr]
[size=15pt]eBay[/size]
You can most likey ebay it for 150-200$ on there!
[/center]

That’s why you should buy the iPhone.

June 29th.

item.title: I'm thinking about getting a new phone
item.dc:creator: @Uriko Uriko
item.description:
@Uriko wrote:

[quote=“MybBob, post:12, topic:98213”][quote author=Stork link=topic=141216.msg1355164#msg1355164 date=1179791747]
Fair enough.
My mate has an 810i, it’s fucking invincible. We were playing dashboard conkers in a mates car and it flew right out of an open window, still works fine
[/quote]

I smacked my W810i with a cricket bat ( In my mates back garden, we lost the tennis ball ) still works, perfect, scartched to fuck, and a crack in screen ( abit ) but working perfect ![/quote]
Just… why?

The phone Eh Pretty Easy showed is fucking sexy, I so want it.

Read full topic
